trans-unit.source: Grand Master of Flowers
trans-unit.target: Grand Master of Flowers

trans-unit.resname: PAFR·17a | Grand Master of Flowers | Card Text
trans-unit.source: As long as Grand Master of Flowers has seven or more loyalty counters on him, he's a 7/7 Dragon God creature with flying and indestructible. [+1]: Target creature without first strike, double strike, or vigilance can't attack or block until your next turn. [+1]: Search your library and/or graveyard for a card named Monk of the Open Hand, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you search your library this way, shuffle.

trans-unit.source: Ellywick Tumblestrum
trans-unit.target: Ellywick Tumblestrum

trans-unit.source: [+1]: Venture into the dungeon. (Enter the first room or advance to the next room.) [−2]: Look at the top six cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card from among them and put it into your hand. If it's legendary, you gain 3 life. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. [−7]: You get an emblem with "Creatures you control have trample and haste and get +2/+2 for each differently named dungeon you've completed."

trans-unit.source: {2}, {T}: Roll a d20 and subtract the number of cards in your hand.
